attributes.action: Call for the resignation of David Cameron and George Osborne by June 24, 2016
attributes.background: Having been elected into power it is widely regarded that David Cameron and George Osborne have made a mockery of the UK. This is symbolised by their dealing of the remain campaign for the EU referendum, going back on previous statements and blatant acts of scare mongering.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
